Test.Name: Build Numbers
Test.Description: Exchange Servers are running the latest build.
Test.IfPassedComments: All Exchange Server 2013/2016 servers are running the latest build.
Test.IfFailedComments: One or more Exchange Server 2013/2016 servers are not running the latest build.

Test.Name: Client Access Namespaces
Test.Description: Check if multiple namespaces exist for a protocol within the same AD site.
Test.IfPassedComments: All Exchange sites have a single namespace per HTTPS protocol.
Test.IfFailedComments: One or more Exchange sites has more than one namespace per HTTPS protocol.

Test.Name: Server FQDNs in URLs
Test.Description: Check that CAS URLs don't contain server FQDNs.
Test.IfPassedComments: No Exchange HTTPS services have URLs containing server FQDNs.
Test.IfFailedComments: One or more Exchange HTTPS services has a URL containing server FQDNs.
